original_title: One person succumbs after being shot in Midigama
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A person who sustained injuries in a shooting in Midigama, Matara succumbed during the early hours of Thursday (30) morning.
Police said a group of people who arrived in a car had shot the man on Wednesday (29) evening and fled the scene.
